FuncDef: The display stp region-configuration command displays a MST region's valid configuration, including the region name, revision level, mappings between VLANs and spanning tree instances, and configuration digest.

ParaDef.Info:
Displays digest of a valid MST region configuration.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
After an MST region is configured and takes effect on the MSTP network, run the display stp region-configuration command to view the MST region name, revision level, mapping between STP MSTIs and VLANs.
Precautions
If you run this command in the MSTP process view without specifying an MSTP process, information about the MSTP process in this view is displayed by default. If you run this command in the other view without specifying an MSTP process, information about MSTP process 0 is displayed by default.
